about_the_game:
"Solana and Sunny's Atelier" is an old-school JRPG in which item synthesis is the main focus.
Although it is in the RPG genre, there is no grand theme of adventure, battles against powerful demon kings or arch-enemies, or saving the country or the world.
There is no grand theme of saving the country or the world.
You are a novice alchemist named "Solana" and spend your days synthesizing items in order to become a full-fledged alchemist.

*Although the screenshots and PV are displayed in Japanese.
You can switch between English and Japanese during game play.


[Game Flow]
A simple cycle of "Request," "Collect," and "Synthesize.
First, accept "requests" at the bar.
Once the request is made, go to the field and "gather" materials.
Then, you "mix" the materials at the workshop and deliver the finished product to the client.
This cycle is repeated to earn money.

About the demo version
This demo version is only available in Japanese.
In the demo version, you can play until 90 days have passed in the game, or until certain events are completed.
This demo version is only for experiencing a part of the game system, and there may be minor bugs and parts that have not been fully adjusted.
Please note that the opening and some of the events are omitted from the demo version.

  • OS *: Windows 8 / 8.1 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 相当以上
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GLに対応したもの
